asap.faceengine

Class FacePlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.AbstractPlanner<TimedFaceUnit>
      • asap.faceengine.FacePlanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    asap.realizer.Planner<TimedFaceUnit>

    public class FacePlanner
extends asap.realizer.AbstractPlanner<TimedFaceUnit>
    This planner will in the future support planning of face behaviors -- i.e. face expressions and such. In addition, the faceplanner allows for the possiblities to set visemes at certain TimePegs. This functionality is mostly accessed by the verbalplanner.
    Author:
    Reidsma, welberge
